mapper.insert: insert into pet_movie (movie_id, movie_title, movie_director, movie_rating, release_date, movie_url, move_poster, shelf_status, created_at, updated_at, movie_desc) values (#{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movieTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movieDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movieRating,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{releaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{movieUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movePoster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shelfStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{movieDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pet_movie set movie_title = #{movieTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movie_director = #{movieDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movie_rating = #{movieRating,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, release_date = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, movie_url = #{movieUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, move_poster = #{movePoster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shelf_status = #{shelfStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, movie_desc = #{movieDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select movie_id, movie_title, movie_director, movie_rating, release_date, movie_url, move_poster, shelf_status, created_at, updated_at, movie_desc from pet_movie where movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
